amazon coin

the program allows customer to receive and purchase amazon coin coin and to redeem those coin for the purchase of eligible digital product we sell through the amazon appstore for android the amazon appstore
the program includes two type of coin coin you purchase from u or receive a gift from another customer purchased coin and coin we give you for promotional purpose promotional coin
each coin is worth 0 01 when making purchase through the amazon appstore
use of coin
2 1 redeeming coin
coin may be redeemed only for the purchase of eligible product through the amazon appstore
eligible product may change over time
not all apps and in app product can be purchased using coin and not all device support the use of coin
when purchase can be made with coin you will see an option to pay with coin during the purchase process
to make purchase with coin you must pay the entire purchase price for the applicable product plus any applicable tax with coin
2 2 purchased coin
purchase of coin will be charged to the 1 click payment method associated with your amazon account
all purchase of coin are final
we do not accept return of purchased coin except where required by law
if you believe any purchased coin were not properly credited to your account please contact amazon customer service for assistance
if we offer discount on the purchase of coin we may modify or discontinue those discount at any time without notice to you
2 3 gifting coin
we may allow you to give purchased coin a gift to other customer
to gift coin you must designate the coin a gift prior to purchase
you may not gift purchased coin that have already been applied to your account or promotional coin

if you purchase coin a gift and you specify future date for delivery of the coin we will charge your account at the time of purchase but you can obtain full refund if you cancel the order prior to the scheduled delivery date
2 4 promotional coin
all coin that you do not pay for other than coin you receive a gift from another customer are promotional coin
this includes any coin we give you in connection with your purchase of apps or other product your use of other amazon service or any other promotional activity
2 5 expiration date
application of coin
purchased coin do not expire
promotional coin expire one year after the later of the date we give them to you or the date you last purchased or redeemed coin
when you make purchase with coin any promotional coin you have will be applied first followed by your purchased coin
2 6 restriction
coin cannot be resold transferred for value or redeemed for cash except to the extent required by law
coin in one amazon account may not be transferred to another amazon account
we may limit the number of coin you can purchase or receive within certain period of time or implement other restriction on the receipt or use of coin
if we give you promotional coin in connection with your purchase of product and you later return or receive refund for that product we may revoke those promotional coin

if you have already used those coin we may deduct the same number of other promotional coin or purchased coin from your account or charge your credit card or other payment instrument for any product you purchased using those coin

5 1 change

5 2 termination
fraud
your right under the agreement and to use the program will automatically terminate without notice if you fail to comply with any of the term of this agreement
we may also terminate your right to use the program at any time including if we determine your use violates any term of the agreement or involves any fraud or misuse of the program
in case of such termination you must cease all use of the program and we may immediately revoke your access to the program without notice to you

if we determine you fraudulently obtain coin or use any fraudulently obtained coin we may revoke those coin and charge your credit card or other payment instrument for any product purchased using those coin
our failure to insist upon or enforce your strict compliance with the agreement will not constitute waiver of any of our right
5 3 amendment
we may amend the agreement at our sole discretion by posting the revised term on amazon com
your continued use of the program after any amendment evidence your agreement to be bound by it

5 6 limitation of liability
